title: Best of The Herd: 06/18/20
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/18/20
description:
Colin discusses Kevin Durant's "sellout" comments towards Kendrick Perkins, why the media might actually hurt Colin Kaepernick's chances of getting back in the NFL, possible reason why the Dak Prescott contract talks are still going on, why Cam Newton isn't the greatest Panther, Colin admits he was wrong about Daniel Jones. Guests: Writer for The Athletic Shams Charania and former NFL offensive lineman Geoff Schwartz.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
